haReport:
This mission was flown by:
Kmdr Patrik Schorner
Ltn Augustus Kass
Ltn Luther Schaumann
Uffz Karl Nostitz

 The mission was flown from Balatre aerodrome.

Successes include the following: 
On 30/08/1916 near La Gorgue.
A F.E.2b of No 10 Squadron RFC was brought down by Wenzel Scheiner of Jasta 16b.
Maj Russell Prophet was killed in action.
Lt Arthur Crickett was killed in action.
Wenzel Scheiner was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.

On 30/08/1916 near Ypres.
A F.E.2b of No 16 Squadron RFC was brought down by Oswald Fromm of Jasta 16b.
2nd Lt Seth Fabian was killed in action.
Lt Shawn Gorst was killed in action.
Oswald Fromm was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.

On 30/08/1916 near Epagny.
A F.E.2b of Esc 7 was brought down by Detlef Schwarzer of Jasta 16b.
Cpl Dominique Bastoux was killed in action.
S/Lt Etienne Besse was killed in action.
Detlef Schwarzer was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.

On 30/08/1916 near Sampigny.
A Nieuport 11.C1 of Esc N.65 was brought down by Siegfried Ganzfried of Jasta 16b.
Cne Marc Gardel was killed in action.
Siegfried Ganzfried was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.

On 30/08/1916 near Troyon.
A Nieuport 17.C1 GBR of Esc N.31 was brought down by Viktor Schiller of Jasta 16b.
Cpl Arsene Honore was killed in action.
Viktor Schiller was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.

On 30/08/1916 near Chauny.
A F.E.2b of Esc 40 was brought down by Patrik Schorner of Jasta 16b.
Ignace Goarnigou was killed in action.
Florentin Lachaud was not injured.
Patrik Schorner was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.

On 30/08/1916 near StMihiel.
A F.E.2b of Esc 64 was brought down by Hasso Lobe of Jasta 16b.
Cpl Bertrand Lagache was killed in action.
S/Lt Albin Carre was killed in action.
Hasso Lobe was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.

On 30/08/1916 near Broussey-Raulecourt.
A Nieuport 11.C1 of Esc N.112 was brought down by Lambrecht Steinberg of Jasta 16b.
Cne Marc Mora was killed in action.
Lambrecht Steinberg was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.

On 30/08/1916 near La Gorgue.
A F.E.2b of No 2 Squadron RFC was brought down by Florian Lasch of Jasta 16b.
2nd Lt Uriah Galey was killed in action.
Lt Rufus Walker was killed in action.
Florian Lasch was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.

On 30/08/1916 near Chavignon.
A F.E.2b of Esc 108 was brought down by Nikolaus Schildhauer of Jasta 16b.
Lt Jean-Marie Lafon was killed in action.
S/Lt Olivier Schlegel was killed in action.
Nikolaus Schildhauer was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.


Pilots lost were: 
    Kmdr Patrik Schorner: Injured
